name: PC Casing
body: The best PC case is more than just a box to throw all your gear in; it's about looks too. You want your PC case to make a statement on your desk, or at least look nicely subdued.

name: Motherboard
body: This  Motherboard supports PCIe Gen3 x4 Ultra M.2 interface pushes data transfer speeds up to 32Gb/s. In addition, it also supports SATA3 6Gb/s M.2 modules, and is compatible with ASRock’s U.2 Kit for installing some of the world’s fastest U.2 PCIe Gen3 x4 SSDs.

name: DDR5 Ram 8Gb
body: Crucial DDR5 Desktop Memory can empower your computer to transfer 50% more data than DDR4 at launch, resulting in faster load times, file transfers, downloads, refresh rates and less lag time.

name: IPS Display Monitor
body: Immersive Gaming Performance. Make every moment count. Escape reality and reign over your virtual worlds. These gaming monitors have the speed, specs, and special features you crave. Accurate color performance & professional appointments empower your creative success.

name: HDD 4Tb
body: In terms of gigabytes on the dollar, it’s the best-value hard drive out there. The spin speeds of 7,200 RPM ensure fast enough performance for most purposes, certainly enough to be a time saver..

name: Processor
body: Get the high-speed gaming performance of the world’s best desktop processor. AMD Ryzen™ processors have all the best features to keep you in the game.Whether gaming or creating, AMD Ryzen™ processors offer ultimate performance.
